value: hi I'm Sean Morgan and I teach the
American accent now you might think it's
kind of weird that someone teaches an
pronunciation is one of the most
important parts of learning a language
programs all over the world don't even
teach it they focus on grammar and some
things that aren't as essential for
communication for things like travel so
there are lots of people that definitely
need help with people understanding them
whether it's in the business world where
English is the most important language
